annotation.spannedText: we are able to save children's lives and prevent disabilities through the use of vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: we are able to save children's lives and prevent disabilities through the use of vaccines

annotation.spannedText: This threat arises when the percentage of vaccinated children falls below a certain threshold-usually at least 90 or 95 percent

classMention.mentionClass: This threat arises when the percentage of vaccinated children falls below a certain threshold-usually at least 90 or 95 percent

annotation.spannedText: When this happens, disease is able spread more readily through the community, affecting those who are unable to be immunized, such as infants or immune-suppressed children or elderly

classMention.mentionClass: When this happens, disease is able spread more readily through the community, affecting those who are unable to be immunized, such as infants or immune-suppressed children or elderly

annotation.spannedText: in order to stop the spread of vaccine preventable disease, each community is reliant on actions of its individuals

classMention.mentionClass: in order to stop the spread of vaccine preventable disease, each community is reliant on actions of its individuals

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines play a fundamental role in protecting our lives and those around us from illness and death

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines play a fundamental role in protecting our lives and those around us from illness and death

annotation.spannedText: They prevent diseases like measles that can cause brain damage, polio that paralyzes, and meningitis that can cause brain damage or even death

classMention.mentionClass: They prevent diseases like measles that can cause brain damage, polio that paralyzes, and meningitis that can cause brain damage or even death

annotation.spannedText: It is easy to take vaccine protection for granted

classMention.mentionClass: It is easy to take vaccine protection for granted

annotation.spannedText: They have been so effective in eliminating disease that many people are unaware of the extent of suffering they once inflicted

classMention.mentionClass: They have been so effective in eliminating disease that many people are unaware of the extent of suffering they once inflicted

annotation.spannedText: We must ask our state legislatures to vote against bills that would soften existing requirements or allow for more vaccination exemptions

classMention.mentionClass: We must ask our state legislatures to vote against bills that would soften existing requirements or allow for more vaccination exemptions

annotation.spannedText: Let us send the message that we value children's lives and the vaccines that help to keep our country safe from preventable diseases.

classMention.mentionClass: Let us send the message that we value children's lives and the vaccines that help to keep our country safe from preventable diseases.

annotation.spannedText: We can go further to ask our leaders to consider tightening exemption policies altogether

classMention.mentionClass: We can go further to ask our leaders to consider tightening exemption policies altogether
